## ResourceManager.saveScene() method

Save a scene to a JSON file via VFS.

**Signature:**

```typescript
saveScene(scene: Scene, filename: string): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

</th><th>

</th><th>

Description

[Scene](doc/markdown/./scene.scene.md)


</td><td>

Scene to serialize and save.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

</td><td>

string


</td><td>

Destination path in VFS.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Remarks

- Collects async export tasks for embedded resources and awaits them. - Writes a UTF-8 JSON representation to VFS.
